Related repos

  • PyTorch code for language modeling book
  • Finite state machine and regular expression manipulation library
  • Tool for testing regular expressions with real-time results
  • language for writing readable regular expressions
  • large language model tutorials and training basics from scratch
  • Programming system for writing in English
  • Run large language models in a browser
  • Language detection for short or mixed-language text
